snippet: Thomas Vanek scored the go-ahead goal in the second period, and the Wild beat Columbus, 3-2, pushing the visiting Blue Jackets to 0-8-0 and spoiling Coach John Tortorella’s debut.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Minnesota Wild beats Columbus Blue Jackets, 3-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Vanek scored the go-ahead goal in the second period, and the Wild beat Columbus, 3-2, pushing the visiting Blue Jackets to 0-8-0 and spoiling Coach John Tortorella’s debut.

headline.print_headline: Tortorella Loses in Debut With Blue Jackets
headline.main: Minnesota Spoils Tortorella’s Blue Jackets Debut
